perseverance.title: Mars 2020 Perseverance Rover
perseverance.info:
Launched on July 30, 2020
Launched from Cape Canaveral Air Force Station, Florida
Landed on Feb. 18, 2021
Landed at Jezero Crater, Mars
Mission Ongoing

curiosity.title: Mars Science Laboratory Curiosity
curiosity.info:
Launched on November 26, 2011
Launched from Cape Canaveral Air Force Station, Florida
Landed on August 6, 2012
Landed at Gale Crater, Mars
Mission Ongoing

opportunity.title: Mars Exploration Rover Opportunity
opportunity.info:
Launched on July 8, 2003
Launched from Cape Canaveral Air Force Station, Florida
Landed on January 25, 2004
Landed at Meridiani Planum
Mission Complete, ended on February 13, 2019

spirit.title: Mars Exploration Rover Spirit
spirit.info:
Launched on June 10, 2003
Launched from Cape Canaveral Air Force Station, Florida
Landed on January 4, 2004
Landed at Gusev Crater
Mission Complete, ended on March 22, 2010

climate_orbiter.title: Mars Climate Orbiter
climate_orbiter.info:
Launched on December 11, 1998
Launched from Cape Canaveral Air Force Station, Florida
Mission Failed, lost on arrival

exomars.title: ExoMars 2016 Mission
exomars.info:
Launched on March 14, 2016
Launched from Baikonur Cosmodrome, Russia
**Trance Gas Orbiter**
Orbit Insertion on October 19, 2016
Mission Ongoing
**Schiaparelli Landing Demo**
Released from orbiter on October 16, 2016
Mission Failed, lost on descent

global_surveyor.title: Mars Global Surveyor
global_surveyor.info:
Launched on November 7, 1996
Launched from Cape Canaveral Air Force Station, Florida
Orbit Insertion September 12, 1997
Mission Complete, ended on November 14, 2006

mariner.title: Mariner 3-9
mariner.info:
Launched Between November 28, 1964 and May 30, 1971
Launched from Cape Canaveral Air Force Station, Florida
Missions complete between, December 21, 1967 and October 27, 1972

express.title: Mars Express
express.info:
Launched on June 2, 2003
Launched from Baikonur Cosmodrome, Russia
Orbit insertion on December 25, 2003
Mission ongoing

maven.title: Mars Atmospheric and Volatile EvolutioN (Maven)
maven.info:
Launched on November 18, 2013
Launched from Cape Canaveral Air Force Station, Florida
Orbit insertion on September 22, 2014
Mission ongoing

mro.title: Mars Reconnaissance Orbiter (MRO)
mro.info:
Launched on August 12, 2005
Launched from Cape Canaveral Air Force Station, Florida
Orbit insertion on March 10, 2006
Mission ongoing

observer.title: Mars Observer
observer.info:
Launched on September 25, 1992
launched from Cape Canaveral Air Force Station, Florida
Mission Failed, Communication lost prior to orbit insertion

odyssey.title: Mars Odyssey
odyssey.info:
Launched on April 7, 2001
Launched from Cape Canaveral Air Force Station, Florida
Orbit insertion on October 24, 2001
Mission ongoing

pathfinder.title: Mars Pathfinder
pathfinder.info:
Launched on December 4, 1996.
Launched from Cape Canaveral Air Force Station, Florida.
Landed on July 4, 1997.
Landed at Ares Vallis, Mars
Mission Complete, ended on September 27, 1997.

phoenix.title: Mars Phoenix
phoenix.info:
Launched  on August 4, 2007
Launched From Cape Canaveral Air Force Station, Florida
Landed on May 25, 2008
Landed at Vastitas Borealis, the arctic plains of Mars
Mission Complete, ended on November 2, 2008

polar.title: Mars Polar Lander/Deep Space 2
polar.info:
'Launched on January 3, 1999
Launched from Cape Canaveral Air Force Station, Florida
Mission Failed, lost on arrival(December 3, 1999)

viking.title: Viking 1 & 2
viking.info:
Launched on August 20, 1975 UTC and September 9, 1975 UTC
Launched from Cape Canaveral Air Force Station, Florida
Landed on July 20, 1976 and September 3, 1976
Landed at Chryse Planitia and Utopia Planitia
Mission Complete, ended on November 13, 1982 and April 11, 1980

insight.title: InSight
insight.info:
Launched on May 5, 2018
Launched from Vandenberg Air Force Base, California
Landed on November 26, 2018
Landed at Elysium Planitia, Mars
Mission Ongoing

bug.title: Bugs?
bug.info:
If you found a bug in Mars Bot please report it on the Git hub repository
https://github.com/mebrooks01/Mars-Bot/issues
Or join our server and talk to us about it

invite.title: Invite Me!!
invite.info:
Invite me to your discord using the following link.
https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=760605516384305224&scope=bot&permissions=1141242945

mars.title: Mars
mars.info:
Mars is the fourth planet from the Sun and the second-smallest planet in the Solar System, being larger than only Mercury. In English, Mars carries the name of the Roman god of war and is often referred to as the 'Red Planet'. The latter refers to the effect of the iron oxide prevalent on Mars surface, which gives it a reddish appearance distinctive among the astronomical bodies visible to the naked eye. Mars is a terrestrial planet with a thin atmosphere, with surface features reminiscent of the impact craters of the Moon and the valleys, deserts and polar ice caps of Earth.
Sources:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mars
https://mars.nasa.gov/

suggest.title: Suggestions?
suggest.info:
If you have a suggest for Mars Bot please post it on the Git hub repository

Or join our server and talk to us about it

support.title: Support?
support.info: Join the community discord for advanced support with the bot and get a sneak peak into the development of this bot.
